description:
Launch an ECS task for on-demand tasks from the Waypoint server.

This will use the standard AWS environment variables and IAM Role information to
source authentication information for AWS, using the configured task role.
If no task role name is specified, Waypoint will create one with the required
permissions.
name: aws-ecs

optionalFields.Synopsis: Cluster name to place On-Demand runner tasks in
optionalFields.Summary: ECS Cluster to place On-Demand runners in. This defaults to the cluster used by the Waypoint server

optionalFields.Synopsis: The name of the AWS IAM role to apply to the task's Execution Role
optionalFields.Summary: ExecutionRoleName is the name of the AWS IAM role to apply to the task's Execution Role. At this time we reuse the same Role as the Waypoint server Execution Role.

optionalFields.Synopsis: Cloud Watch Log Group to use for On-Demand Runners
optionalFields.Summary: Cloud Watch Log Group to use for On-Demand Runners. Defaults to the log group used for runners (waypoint-runner).

optionalFields.Synopsis: CPU to use for the On-Demand runners.
optionalFields.Summary: Configure the CPU for the On-Demand runners. The default is 512. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECS/latest/developerguide/task_definition_parameters.html for valid values

optionalFields.Synopsis: Memory to use for the On-Demand runners.
optionalFields.Summary: Configure the memory for the On-Demand runners. The default is 1024. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECS/latest/developerguide/task_definition_parameters.html for valid values
AWS region to use. Defaults to the region used for the Waypoint Server.

optionalFields.Synopsis: The name of the AWS IAM role to apply to the task's Task Role
optionalFields.Summary: TaskRoleName is the name of the AWS IAM role to apply to the task. This role determines the privileges the ODR builder. If no role name is given, an IAM role will be created with the required policies

outputAttrsHelp: Output attributes can be used in your `waypoint.hcl` as [variables](/waypoint/docs/waypoint-hcl/variables) via [`artifact`](/waypoint/docs/waypoint-hcl/variables/artifact) or [`deploy`](/waypoint/docs/waypoint-hcl/variables/deploy).

requiredFields.Synopsis: Docker image for the Waypoint On-Demand Runners
requiredFields.Summary:
Docker image for the Waypoint On-Demand Runners. This will
default to the server image with the name (not label) suffixed with '-odr'."

requiredFields.Synopsis: Security Group ID to place the On-Demand Runner task in
requiredFields.Summary: Security Group ID to place the On-Demand Runner task in. This defaults to the security group used for the Waypoint server

requiredFields.Synopsis: List of subnets to place the On-Demand Runner task in.
requiredFields.Summary: List of subnets to place the On-Demand Runner task in. This defaults to the list of subnets configured for the Waypoint server and must be either identical or a subset of the subnets used by the Waypoint server
